page.title: 05BIRCOTES SPORTS CENTRE (1)
page.content: I like the{Sports Centre }because it is near,neat and tidy.I also like it because it has got a lot of good games and activities.I also like the{Sports {Centre }because when something goes wrong one of the assistants comes to help you straight away and they are very polite.My favourite activities are{Swimming }and watching {Squash.}I also like the{Sports centre}because it is very cheap.But I think that there is too much chlorine in the{ {Swimming}pool.We did a survey of people who use the {Sports Centre} and asked about the things they liked about the {Sports Centre}.Some of the things we found out are on the next page.
